description: Defines a ViewModel class for managing user session state, including login, registration, and logout functionalities, interacting with a backend API through Retrofit.

classes.name: SessionViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel managing user session state, including login, registration, and logout.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs user login via API, updates session state on success or failure.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Performs user registration via API, updates error state based on success or failure.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears session token and updates login status.
